name: Dadobug1111's Ores
description:
Adds Bedrock ores into the game, giving slow, but unlimited resources.

Assets used from the following mods to add associated bedrock ores:
Tech Reborn - Team Reborn
Tinkers Construct - Slime Knights
Applied Energistics 2 - Team Applied Energistics
Extreme Reactors - ZeroNoRyouki / Erogenous Beef
Bigger Reactors - BiggerSeries / Erogenous Beef
Immersive Engineering - BluSunrize
Mythic Metals - Noaaan
Create - Creators of Create
Mekanism - Mekanism
Undergarden - quek04
Beyond Earth - MrScautHD
FTB Industrial Contraptions - Feed The Beast
Malum - SammySemicolon
Thermal Series - TeamCoFH
